title: Villa Prestige Cassis
description:
Elegant Accommodations

Villa Prestige Cassis in Cassis offers a spacious garden, terrace, and a year-round outdoor swimming pool. Guests enjoy free WiFi, ensuring connectivity throughout their stay.

Comfortable Amenities

The villa features four bedrooms and four bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a comfortable living room. Additional amenities include air-conditioning, a washing machine, and a dishwasher.

Prime Location

Located 28 mi from Marseille Provence Airport, the property is 1.1 mi from Anse de Corton Beach. Nearby attractions include Orange Velodrome Stadium and Noter-Dame de la Garde Basilica, each 14 mi away.

Outdoor Activities

Guests can enjoy boating and scuba diving in the surrounding area, providing ample opportunities for outdoor enthusiasts.

Appartement le Quai du Port Cassis parking clim offers accommodations in Cassis, a 5-minute walk from Grande Mer and 12 miles from Orange Velodrome Stadium. This beachfront property offers access to a terrace, free private parking, and free Wifi. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and an ATM for guests.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with streaming services is available. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

A mini-market is available at the apartment.

A casino is available on-site and hiking can be enjoyed close to the apartment.

Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 12 miles from Appartement le Quai du Port Cassis parking clim, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Center is 12 miles away. Marseille Provence Airport is 28 miles from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

La Timone Metro Station is 14 miles from Cassis centre, while Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica is 14 miles away. Marseille Provence Airport is 28 miles from the property.
